medications.name: Paracetamol
medications.description: Used to reduce fever and relieve mild to moderate pain.

medications.name: Ibuprofen
medications.description: An NSAID used to reduce fever, pain, and inflammation.

medications.name: Aspirin
medications.description: Used to relieve pain, reduce fever, and reduce inflammation.

medications.name: Loratadine
medications.description: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms.

medications.name: Cetirizine
medications.description: An antihistamine used to treat allergic rhinitis and chronic urticaria.

medications.name: Cough Syrup
medications.description: Relieves coughs caused by colds, flu, or other respiratory conditions.

medications.name: Dextromethorphan
medications.description: A cough suppressant used to treat dry coughs.

medications.name: Amoxicillin
medications.description: An antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.

medications.name: Azithromycin
medications.description: An antibiotic used to treat infections of the respiratory tract, skin, and other areas.

medications.name: Metformin
medications.description: An oral medication used to control blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.

medications.name: Insulin
medications.description: Hormone therapy to help control blood sugar levels in diabetes.

medications.name: Prednisone
medications.description: A corticosteroid used to reduce inflammation and suppress the immune system.

medications.name: Naproxen
medications.description: An NSAID used to reduce pain, fever, and inflammation.
